definition: to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: I cupped the deers muzzle in my hand and breathed into its hot mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我用手环住鹿的吻部，往它温热的嘴里吹气。

sentences.english: Too much late-night ice cream can blow up your physique.
sentences.chinese: 太晚吃太多的冰淇淋会让你吹气似的长。

sentences.english: Then it curls its trunk under, sticks the tip of its trunk into its mouth, and blows.
sentences.chinese: 然后象鼻向下卷曲，鼻子的末端插入嘴里，吹气。

sentences.english: But people may worry about getting sick from blowing into a stranger's mouth.
sentences.chinese: 但是，人们可能会担心因向陌生人嘴里吹气而患病。

sentences.english: With huge puff the balloon was blown up and then suddenly burst.
sentences.chinese: 猛烈的吹气后，汽球膨胀起来，突然又破掉了。

sentences.english: Safety and the construction of the air-blowing device.
sentences.chinese: 安全性与吹气装置结构。

sentences.english: Unique film valves, blowpipe inflatable, inflatable deflated lets you more easily.
sentences.chinese: 独特的薄膜阀门，吹管吹气，让您充气放气更轻松。

sentences.english: Online measurement of pulse amplitude by air purge was studied.
sentences.chinese: 采用吹气法在线测量脉冲萃取柱脉冲振幅参数。

sentences.english: Start to whistle by putting two fingers in your mouth in a U-shape before blowing.
sentences.chinese: 吹气前，先把两根手指头摆出U型放入口中。

sentences.english: The design of laser blow-off system and experimental result are presented.
sentences.chinese: 给出了激光吹气系统的设计，以及初步的实验结果。

sentences.english: I must try to start his breathing at once by using the mouth-to-mouth way.
sentences.chinese: 我必须立即用口对口吹气的方法给他做人工呼吸。

sentences.english: He cupped his hands. He puffed breath in and out.
sentences.chinese: 他把两手弯成杯形，来回地吸气吹气。

sentences.english: A. Sure. What?You should blow into a paper bag.
sentences.chinese: 当然可以，什么办法？你向一个纸袋里吹气。

sentences.english: She put her hands on his temples and blew in his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她双手捂住他的太阳穴，对着他的眼睛吹气。

sentences.english: She blew on her food to make it cool.
sentences.chinese: 她对着食物吹气，让它冷下来。

definition: to exhale/to blow off steam/(phonetics) aspirated
to take blood/to draw blood (e.g. for a test)
